title: Amexio Window
description: Window Pane component is a customizable Modal Pane in which user can enter custom content.

gridData.name: footer-align
gridData.description: Alignment of footer contents to right or left.

gridData.name: vertical-position
gridData.description: Alignment of window dialog to top or bottom or center.

gridData.name: top
gridData.description: We can give top height to window in percentage or pixel

gridData.name: horizontal-position
gridData.description: Alignment of window dialog to left or right or center.

gridData.name: show
gridData.description: uses two way binding to Show / Hide Window.

gridData.name: material-design
gridData.description: user doesn't want header background color then user can use  material-design is equal to true

gridData.name: close-on-escape
gridData.description: Window box closes on click of Escape Key.

gridData.name: body-height
gridData.description: Assign body height in percentage, in case of maximize=true it will be set to 100% by default

gridData.name: maximize
gridData.description: User can maximize the window to full screen.

gridData.name: header
gridData.description: it is flag that decides header visibility

gridData.name: footer
gridData.description: it is flag that decides footer visibility

gridData.name: context-menu
gridData.description: Context Menu provides the Window on right click(for Array structure: refer typescript code in source tab)

gridData.name: rightClick
gridData.description: It is fired when clicked on context menu providing Window node data and selected context menu data.
